titleStmt.title: The upright man's peace at his end open'd in a funeral discourse, Decemb. 18. 1681. upon the death of Mr Martyn, citizen of London. By T. Jacombe, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Jacombe, Thomas, 1622-1687.
